page.title: 05LEYBURN MARKET
page.content: A survey was carried out in Leyburn Market Place during June 1985. The following facts were revealed:- 100% of those interviewed were regular visitors to the market. 60% were residents of the town. 20% had travelled by car. 100% of those who travelled by car did use the public car park. 70% expected to spend an hour or less in the market area. 40% intended to have some refreshment in the town. 75% of those having refreshment were going to use commercial premises while the remaining 25% were going to support a local charity event. 60% of those interviewed thought that adequate parking space was available. On the day of the survey there were a great number of holiday visitors.
